languages.text: "И обречете моих ребят на смерть, не подарив им и шанса, как дарят последнему нищему крохи хлеба, в надежде, что он протянет еще немного? Пойдем напролом — и, считайте, лично опустим меч на шею каждого идиота, что некогда присягнул мне в верности".

traits.locale_text: "И обречете моих ребят на смерть, не подарив им и шанса, как дарят последнему нищему крохи хлеба, в надежде, что он протянет еще немного?" {n}Джай отшатывается то ли в испуге, то ли в ярости.{/n} "Пойдем напролом — и, считайте, лично опустим меч на шею каждого идиота, что некогда присягнул мне в верности".

languages.text: "And doom my associates to death, not even giving them a morsel of hope — as you might give a crumb of bread to the lowliest beggar — that it's not all over yet? If we rush in there, we'll be as good as slitting the throat of every idiot who ever swore their loyalty to me."
languages.original_text: "И обречете моих ребят на смерть, не подарив им и шанса, как дарят последнему нищему крохи хлеба, в надежде, что он протянет еще немного? Пойдем напролом — и, считайте, лично опустим меч на шею каждого идиота, что некогда присягнул мне в верности".

traits.locale_text: "And doom my associates to death, not even giving them a morsel of hope — as you might give a crumb of bread to the lowliest beggar — that it's not all over yet? If we rush in there, we'll be as good as slitting the throat of every idiot who ever swore their loyalty to me."

"And doom my associates to death, not even giving them a morsel of hope — as you might give a crumb of bread to the lowliest beggar — that it's not all over yet? If we rush in there, we'll be as good as slitting the throat of every idiot who ever swore their loyalty to me."

"And doom my associates to death, not even giving them a morsel of hope — as you might give a crumb of bread to the lowliest beggar — that it's not all over yet? If we rush in there, we'll be as good as slitting the throat of every idiot who ever swore their loyalty to me."

"And doom my associates to death, not even giving them a morsel of hope — as you might give a crumb of bread to the lowliest beggar — that it's not all over yet? If we rush in there, we'll be as good as slitting the throat of every idiot who ever swore their loyalty to me."

"And doom my associates to death, not even giving them a morsel of hope — as you might give a crumb of bread to the lowliest beggar — that it's not all over yet? If we rush in there, we'll be as good as slitting the throat of every idiot who ever swore their loyalty to me."

languages.text: 「そして、まだ終わっていないという一片の希望も与えずに、仲間たちを死刑に処す…最下層の物乞いにパンくずを与えるのと同じように…もしアタシたちがそこに突入すれば、これまでアタシに忠誠を誓った愚か者の喉を切り裂くのと同じことになるだろう」
languages.original_text: "And doom my associates to death, not even giving them a morsel of hope — as you might give a crumb of bread to the lowliest beggar — that it's not all over yet? If we rush in there, we'll be as good as slitting the throat of every idiot who ever swore their loyalty to me."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、まだ終わっていないという一片の希望も与えずに、仲間たちを死刑に処す…最下層の物乞いにパンくずを与えるのと同じように…もしアタシたちがそこに突入すれば、これまでアタシに忠誠を誓った愚か者の喉を切り裂くのと同じことになるだろう」

languages.text: “这么做的话，我的同伴就必死无疑了，连一丁点活命的希望都不会有了。哪怕是最卑微的乞丐，也有权得到一丁点面包屑，难道不是吗？如果我们硬闯进去，就相当于亲手害死了那些发誓效忠于我的白痴。”
languages.original_text: "And doom my associates to death, not even giving them a morsel of hope — as you might give a crumb of bread to the lowliest beggar — that it's not all over yet? If we rush in there, we'll be as good as slitting the throat of every idiot who ever swore their loyalty to me."

traits.locale_text: “这么做的话，我的同伴就必死无疑了，连一丁点活命的希望都不会有了。哪怕是最卑微的乞丐，也有权得到一丁点面包屑，难道不是吗？如果我们硬闯进去，就相当于亲手害死了那些发誓效忠于我的白痴。”

languages.text: «¿Y condenar a muerte a mis socios, sin ni siquiera darles un ápice de esperanza, cual migaja para un mendigo, de que aún se puede luchar? Si nos precipitamos, estaríamos degollando a esos pobres diablos que una vez me juraron lealtad».
languages.original_text: "And doom my associates to death, not even giving them a morsel of hope — as you might give a crumb of bread to the lowliest beggar — that it's not all over yet? If we rush in there, we'll be as good as slitting the throat of every idiot who ever swore their loyalty to me."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y condenar a muerte a mis socios, sin ni siquiera darles un ápice de esperanza, cual migaja para un mendigo, de que aún se puede luchar? Si nos precipitamos, estaríamos degollando a esos pobres diablos que una vez me juraron lealtad».

languages.text: « Et condamner mes associés, sans même leur laisser la moindre lueur d'espoir ? Ce serait d'une cruauté sans nom. Si on se précipite, ce sera comme si on tranchait nous-mêmes la gorge de tous ceux qui m'ont un jour juré loyauté. »
languages.original_text: "And doom my associates to death, not even giving them a morsel of hope — as you might give a crumb of bread to the lowliest beggar — that it's not all over yet? If we rush in there, we'll be as good as slitting the throat of every idiot who ever swore their loyalty to me."

traits.locale_text: « Et condamner mes associés, sans même leur laisser la moindre lueur d'espoir ? Ce serait d'une cruauté sans nom. Si on se précipite, ce sera comme si on tranchait nous-mêmes la gorge de tous ceux qui m'ont un jour juré loyauté. »

languages.text: "Und meine Partner damit zum Tod verurteilen, ohne jeden Hoffnungsschimmer, dass noch nicht alles vorbei ist – auch der geringste Bettler verdient eine Brotkrume. Wenn wir stürmen, können wir auch eigenhändig jedem Idioten die Kehle durchschneiden, der mir je die Treue geschworen hat."
languages.original_text: "And doom my associates to death, not even giving them a morsel of hope — as you might give a crumb of bread to the lowliest beggar — that it's not all over yet? If we rush in there, we'll be as good as slitting the throat of every idiot who ever swore their loyalty to me."

traits.locale_text: "Und meine Partner damit zum Tod verurteilen, ohne jeden Hoffnungsschimmer, dass noch nicht alles vorbei ist – auch der geringste Bettler verdient eine Brotkrume. Wenn wir stürmen, können wir auch eigenhändig jedem Idioten die Kehle durchschneiden, der mir je die Treue geschworen hat."

languages.text: "Dostlarımın da hayatı bitsin. Berduş, sokaklarda sürünen bir dilencinin önüne atılan ekmek kırıntısı dahi kadar yaşama umutları kalmasın, öyle mi? Öyle içeri dalmak, bana sadakat yemini etmiş o sersemlerin boğazını kesmekle eşdeğerdir."
languages.original_text: "And doom my associates to death, not even giving them a morsel of hope — as you might give a crumb of bread to the lowliest beggar — that it's not all over yet? If we rush in there, we'll be as good as slitting the throat of every idiot who ever swore their loyalty to me."

traits.locale_text: "Dostlarımın da hayatı bitsin. Berduş, sokaklarda sürünen bir dilencinin önüne atılan ekmek kırıntısı dahi kadar yaşama umutları kalmasın, öyle mi? Öyle içeri dalmak, bana sadakat yemini etmiş o sersemlerin boğazını kesmekle eşdeğerdir."
